title: Chopped Greek Salad with Fresh Herbs Recipe
full_text:

4 servings

Ingredients
1
medium
seeded and
diced cucumber
(do not peel, about
2
cups
)
2

peppers

2
cups
)

tomatoes

3
cups
)
1/3
cup

cup

1/2

3
tablespoons

cup

Directions
Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl and toss well. Serve immediately.
